# GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate

**Protocol**

A protocol that handles when the status of turn-based matchmaking changes.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerDelegate : NSObjectProtocol
```

## Overview

To receive notifications when a player cancels turn-based matchmaking or an error occurs, implement this protocol in the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatchmakerViewController] object’s delegate.

## Handling Cancellation and Errors

- **turnBasedMatchmakerViewControllerWasCancelled(_:)**: Handles when the player dismisses the view controller without inviting players.
- **turnBasedMatchmakerViewController(_:didFailWithError:)**: Handles when an error occurs while the local player invites other players.

## Deprecated Methods

- **turnBasedMatchmakerViewController(_:didFind:)**: Handles when the view controller finds participants for a turn-based match.
- **turnBasedMatchmakerViewController(_:playerQuitFor:)**: Handles when a player quits the match.

## Setting the Delegate

- **turnBasedMatchmakerDelegate**: The object that handles turn-based matchmaker view controller changes.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
